page.title: 16LEISURE ACTIVITIES
page.content: Our group wanted to find out about what children did in their spare time, so we did a survey on {leisure.} We made a grid to tick off the answers to our questions. The most popular pastime was {watching television.}Out of the children we talked to, 67 preferred to do this. However {football}was also popular with the boys. Another popular sport was{swimming.} There were some unusual pastimes such as {fencing, ice-skating and {martial arts.} A lot of children liked to{read}in their spare time, or just{play out. } We also asked some questions about clubs. Many of those we talked to go to a local club. They have to pay to go in, and they go about twice a week, usually on Tuesdays and Saturdays. We made a{block graph} to show the results of our{survey. }
